about_the_game: Gain an advantage in the nightmare with a flashlight or laser that detects nearby treasure. They will turn from white to yellow when equipment is near, giving you a better opportunity to find it and survive. You can choose to equip either individually or as a pair. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
detailed_description: Gain an advantage in the nightmare with a flashlight or laser that detects nearby treasure. They will turn from white to yellow when equipment is near, giving you a better opportunity to find it and survive. You can choose to equip either individually or as a pair. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
legal_notice: Outbreak © 2016-2018 Dead Drop Studios LLC. All Rights Reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
